inputs:
Travel Receipts
Travel Itinerary
Employee ID
Claim Form
whom:
Employee
Line Manager/Supervisor
HR Department
Finance Department
process:
Step 1: Employee submits a travel claim form along with receipts and travel itinerary.
Step 2: Line Manager/Supervisor reviews the submitted documents for completeness and accuracy.
Step 3: Line Manager/Supervisor approves or rejects the claim based on company travel policy.
Step 4: Approved claims are forwarded to the HR Department for further verification.
Step 5: HR Department verifies the claim and forwards it to the Finance Department.
Step 6: Finance Department processes the claim and schedules reimbursement.
Step 7: Employee receives reimbursement.
what:
Submission of Claim Form
Verification of Documents
Approval/Rejection of Claim
Processing of Approved Claims
Reimbursement to Employee
how: Online HR Portal Email Submission Manual Review Financial Software for Processing Payments Direct Deposit or Check Issuance
outputs:
Approved Claims
Rejected Claims
Reimbursement Payments
support:
Company Travel Policy
HR Guidelines for Claim Review
Finance Procedures for Reimbursement
IT Support for HR Portal
results:
Timely Reimbursement to Employees
Accurate Record Keeping
Employee Satisfaction
Compliance with Company Policies
